class="regua-navegacao"></nav><script>(function(){window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("regua"),glb.reguaReady=!0,document.documentElement.className+=" has-regua"}).call(this);</script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class="header-navegacao header-home header-navegacao-ge" data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><a class="logo-area" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/"><h1 class="logo icon-produto">sportv</h1></a><div class="to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-floating" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search" /><label for="search-input-floating" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cube-container"><div class="cube"><div class="face front"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><a class="logo-area" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/"><h1 class="logo icon-produto">sportv</h1></a><div class="to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-top" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search" /><label for="search-input-top" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div><div id="busca-padrao"></div><div class="banner"><div class="opec-area opec-right"><div class="opec-internal"><div id="banner_insert" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div><script>typeof OAS_AD != "undefined" && OAS_AD("Right")</script
                            </div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="opec-mobile-topo" class="opec-area opec-mobile opec-mobile-topo opec-x60"><div class="opec-internal"><div id="banner_mobile_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div><script>typeof OAS_MOBILE != "undefined" && OAS_MOBILE("x60")</script></div></div></header><script>
      window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script>

</div><div id="glb-corpo"><div class="row"><div class="small-12 column"><div id="banner_slb_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div><div class="row"><div class="small-12 column"><div><div class="widget__cobertura" ><div class="widget__cobertura--labels"><div id="widget-cobertura-badge"

    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

                </div>

              </div>
            </li>
          {{/each}}
        </script>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<div class="clearfix"></div>
<div class="pagination" id="articles-pagination"></div>
</div>
</div>

  <div class="r7box-title">

        </a>
      </li>

<fieldset>

</div>

</div>

n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><a href="http://sportv.globo.com" class="logo-produto icon-produto"><span class="logo-produto-container">sportv</span></a><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><div class='logo-area item-editoria tamanho-titulo-normal tamanho-titulo-reduzido-smart'><a     </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);

};

    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

<li  title="Wellington e Richarlison falam sobre a mudança de postura do Flu no 2º tempo" data-video-title="Wellington e Richarlison falam sobre a mudança de postura do Flu no 2º tempo" data-video-id="5748597" data-video-data-exibicao="23/03/2017">
